name: Dragonbane Aura

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Aura of courage class feature, caster level 8th.

sections.body: When fighting dragons, your aura of courage expands to a 20-foot-radius emanation, and allies in the aura gain a morale bonus on saving throws against dragon breath equal to your aura of courage's bonus against fear effects.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: The aura of courage is a 10-foot-radius emanation, and grants a +4 morale bonus on fear effects.
sections.name: Normal

description: Those within your dragonbane aura gain the same protection that you do.
